channel.title: Newsletter Audio
channel.description: Newsletters converted to audio for listening on the go.
channel.itunes:author: Allison Netzer
channel.itunes:summary: Newsletters converted to audio for listening on the go.

item.title: Growth Newsletter: How to Identify Your Highest-Impact Growth Opportunities
item.description: Justin Setzer shares the 6-step Problem Discovery process that separates teams with outsized results from everyone else - and why diagnosing before prescribing is the real growth lever.

item.title: Chief Martec: Context Is Gravity in an Expanding Software Universe
item.description: Scott Brinker on why SaaS isn't dying but transforming - the shift to context-as-a-service platforms, ecosystem judo, and why domain expertise matters more than ever in the AI era.

item.title: Growth Newsletter: How to Win on Reddit in 2026
item.description: Colin James Belyea shares the Karma Ladder framework - the counterintuitive playbook for building real organic influence on Reddit through trust, not promotion.

item.title: Growth Newsletter: How Two Words Generated Millions in Revenue
item.description: Justin Setzer shares how adding "it's free" to Grammarly's CTA buttons produced 8x lift - and why finding the right lever matters more than taking big swings.

item.title: Growth Newsletter: Your Growth Experiments Are Lying to You
item.description: Justin Setzer explains the "what vs. why trap" - how growth teams conflate what happened with why it happened, and why qualitative research is essential.

item.title: Topline: The New Pipeline Playbook
item.description: Craig Rosenberg breaks down the who, when, what, and how of modern pipeline generation - from microsegmentation to multi-channel outreach.

item.title: Topline: Mark Roberge on the End of Sales Specialization
item.description: The Sales Acceleration Formula author on scaling science, AI reversing the SDR/AE split, and why to triple-down if the bubble bursts.
